column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention
column2: Leila. We apologize about your disappointing experience with the pasta you received and the poor communication process with our team. If you're open to it
column3: our management team would love to speak with you about this more directly. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column4: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
